Title: Relates to pharmacy benefits where a physician is authorized to dispense certain medications and practices medicine in the oncology setting
Summary: Relates to excepting situations where a physician is authorized to dispense certain medications and practices medicine in the oncology setting from the direction that the department of health remove the pharmacy benefit from the managed care benefit package and provide the pharmacy benefit under the fee for service program.
LawCode: Amd Part FFF ยง1, Chap 56 of 2020
ActClause: AN ACT to amend part FFF of chapter 56 of the laws of 2020 relating to directing the department of health to remove the pharmacy benefit from the managed care benefit package and to provide the pharmacy benefit under the fee for service program, in relation to pharmacy benefits where a physician is authorized to dispense certain medications and practices medicine in the oncology setting
